comments.comment: Ara vedio karapu gon thaka theeruwo tika vedio karapu welawe gihin ara kollawa allagena ra kellage jeewithe beranna thibuna mokada a kolla nirayudai ehew eke u langata giya kiyala me gon rala marenawaya adu tharame uoota galakin hari gahala uge awadanaya wenas karala apooruwatawath oya wechcha winase walakwanna thibba jeewithayak bili wenakam pampori gagaha vedio karanawa mokatada vedio oya minimaruma nowena thanata prayogayak karala anna a kriyawa vedio karala fb dammanam hari ponnayo ralak  punchi daruwo tikak oya gonnu tika hitiya welawe othana hitiyanam a punchi un tika oita wadiya buddimath deyak karala oya minimaruma walakwai ubal vedio kalatb nthath minimarumakata passe aparada karayo policiya hoya gai gon thaka theeruwane aparadayak weddi eka vedio karana eka nemei hapankama aaparadaya mona widihakin ho walakwaganna ekai wadagath wenne topi pirimi welath oya karapu amna mari gon kama thawa mahalokuwata loketama penna fb dala yako man ehema othana hitiyanam ara kollata ara langa hitapu ballawa hari usi gnnala oya kellawa bera gannawa kella hari ho waradi ho hari waradda passe wisadaganna puluwan palaweniyenma wadagath wenne jeewithe berana eka
comments.author: Nilmini Kumari

comments.comment: double game gahana ,gahapu aya den baya wela athi eyalatath me iranamama athweida kiyala , wanchawa thama loke bhayanakama de , maranen kelawara wena ..... jeewithayaka awsanaya theeranaya karanna thawa kenekta kisima aithiyak ne wagema siduweema anumatha karannath be  , eth double game gahana gehanu ,piriminge hithe gesma wedi wela athi mehema dewal dakiddi , mehema kollanta neme , kellekgen ganna thiyena sathetamath aran , e kellage athmema winasha karala , thawa aniyam geniyekwa bedala loketa penna jeewath wena napunsaka pirimi inna ratak meka , me rate samahara gehanu , pirimi gahana samahara game wisadenne mehema , geniyek wancha karama pirimi  mehema thathwekata path wenawanam , pirimiyek athmema winasha karala yanna giyama gehaniyek monatharam asarana wenawa athida ?? jeewitha walata wancha karana genunta piriminta hoda padam .....
